mapper.sql: id, nannyId, scheduleId, orderId, shopId, money, createDate, cashPledgeBalance, isDel
mapper.select: SELECT a.*,js.shopName,jdi.INFO AS statusInfo,d2.INFO AS reasonInfo,d3.INFO AS paymentTypeInfo,d4.INFO AS operateTypeInfo FROM j_nanny_cash_pledge_record a LEFT JOIN j_shop js ON js.shopId=a.shopId left JOIN j_dict_info jdi ON jdi.ID=a.status left JOIN j_dict_info d2 ON d2.ID=a.reason left JOIN j_dict_info d3 ON d3.ID=a.paymentType left JOIN j_dict_info d4 ON d4.ID=a.operateType WHERE a.nannyId=#{0} AND a.isDel=16 ORDER BY a.createDate

SELECT js.shopName,j.shopId, SUM( CASE j.operateType WHEN '199' THEN j.money ELSE 0 END ) AS 'payMoney', count( CASE j.operateType WHEN '200' THEN j.id ELSE 0 END ) AS 'punishmentTimes', SUM( CASE j.operateType WHEN '200' THEN j.money ELSE 0 END ) AS 'punishmentMoney', SUM( CASE j.operateType WHEN '201' THEN j.money ELSE 0 END ) AS 'refundMoney' FROM j_nanny_cash_pledge_record j LEFT JOIN j_shop js ON js.shopId = j.shopId WHERE j.`status` = 53 AND j.isDel=16 AND j.createDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY j.shopId
